title: What jobs can we get with a music technology degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: This will depend on the type of technology. You can design music software if you are in to programming. List of audio programming languages - Wikipedia . Or you may create the next hybrid guitar for Taylor (I just played this last week and am in love (T5 Series Page ), if you are familiar with Luthier - Wikipedia , or an instrument electronics, engineering type. Or here is a simple list of roles that use music technology: Music Technology jobs Follow your passion ~MA
